title: Kickstarter Scam
description:
Michael Montante of Montante’s World is in studio as the first Thursday guest in the post-Klemmer era. Questions are brought up about the legitimacy of Dave’s story being shot at during the bachelor party 10 years ago. Montante has some crazy right wing theories on the 2020 election. Dave lost $1,000 on a Kickstarter based off of an endorsement of Curt Menafee and much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
